title: I love the video about the congressman who plays league but....
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WTQmAY4wd9s

But...the references between politics/league were cringe as fuck.

Ganking the senate? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Over all awesome vid though, i love seeing successful adult gamers. Guys like him are a role model for all of us that ain't never gunna put down the controller
